title: Will a bachelor's in forensic science, or a BSc in biochemistry, be more helpful to become a forensic scientist? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on your ultimate goal. Think about the sort of environment you’d most like to work in. Forensics is the application of science to something that occurs, whether it’s mining for data in a cell phone or computer, or sampling DNA or blood, or sifting through debris to find the cause of a building collapse. If you are unsure, a general forensics degree will help you narrow your choices by the time you graduate.
